output.sentences: I left my house and got on the subway to head over to a friends
When I got there, I saw a male I didnt recognize, and he was listening to my friend share about his recent mission work, where I found out he was making a movie about her trip.
Once I got there and I was listening to my friend telling this male about her job at the missionary, which was the theme of the show.
His wife actually came up with the idea to bring up the history of the missionary as a part in the movie.
So we went online and read about the local history, which was so interesting we spent the night buying some books to do more research.
